title: The Lumps of Clay feat. Maulik Pancholy
dc:creator: WBUR
description: In this classic Indian tale, Maulik Pancholy (Phineas and Ferb, Sanjay and Craig) plays a wonderfully wise adviser who finds an ingenious way to bring the truth to light.
